items.title: Don’t Bet the House on the 50-Year Mortgage
items.description: President Trump’s proposed reform would be a terrible deal for homebuyers and taxpayers alike.

items.title: The 50-Year Mortgage Would Make Things Worse for Gen Z
items.description: This is not the answer to the housing crisis.

items.title: Fighting to Preserve the American Experiment
items.description: The conservative movement is needed today more than ever, especially as the alternatives fail.

items.title: This Time, It’s the Populists Who Are Underestimating Trump
items.description: The idea that another candidate can win in 2028 with a purer version of Buchananism ignores the president’s actual appeal.

items.title: The Government vs. Animal Lovers
items.description: If you enjoy the company of animals, the government may deem you a criminal.
